thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com
thread.title: Lauren Beach

author: Lauren Beach
title: Lauren Beach
text: If you have ever doubted the quality of care your pet receives at a boarding house/kennel while you are away, Dog Vacay provides an excellent solution to bring you peace of mind. Based on my experience with a Nashville host, Karli, who took care of my 100 lb dog, Danny, I can attest that Dog Vacay contracts with hosts who are caring, professional, reliable, and flexible. I highly recommend the service.
